Name: Poly Jigsaw: Animals
About the game: Poly Jigsaw: Animals is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute animals. Featuring 50 hand drawn images in a polygonal style, with each puzzle piece uniquely shaped in a way no physical puzzle could be. The player's goal - puzzle pieces together to get a beautiful picture. In Poly Jigsaw: Animals: - 50 levels - Polygonal art - Simple controls (mouse) - Achievements - Relax music
